H0.text: What type of creature is a Meadow Brown. Moth

H1.text: What type of creature is a Meadow Brown. Deer

H2.text: What type of creature is a Meadow Brown. Squirrel

H3.text: What type of creature is a Meadow Brown. Butterfly

A4.text: The meadow brown (Maniola jurtina) is a butterfly found in the Palearctic realm.

A5.text: Adults feed on nectar from a wide spectrum of plants including Centaurea, Cirsium, Leontodon, Erica, Rubus, Heracleum, Eupatorium, (sensu lato) Origanum, Senecio, Scabiosa, Succisa, Ligustrum and Filipendula.
